modName: Fava Beans and Chianti - Foods For the Discerning Cannibal
summary: Adds fresh liver, fava beans and nice Chianti to Hogni Red-Arm's inventory in Markarth.  Also makes Lisbet at Arnleif and Sons sell equippable silverware.
descriptionHtml:
----------------------------------------------------------
Fava Beans and Chianti - Foods For the Discerning Cannibal
----------------------------------------------------------

If the "bloodiest meat in the Reach" is simply insufficient for your refined palate, this mod allows you to enjoy a classic combination of flavors. Adds the following items to Hogni Red-Arm's inventory in Markarth:

- Fresh Liver
- Fava Beans
- Nice Chianti

Lisbet at Arnleif and Sons will sell you equippable silverware (listed under Weapons) so that you may enjoy your dinner in style.

If you prefer a mod with more standard foods, check out my other mod, Babette's Feast: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5816


----------------------------------------------------------
Installation Instructions:
----------------------------------------------------------

Extract all files into Skyrim's Data folder (for me, that's under C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data). If you already have existing meshes and textures folders, click Yes or Yes to All when it prompts you whether you want to copy the files into them.

Once you unpack the files, verify that the mod is activated by selecting "Data Files" from the loader screen, and ensuring that "FavaBeansAndChianti.esp" is checked.


----------------------------------------------------------
Credits
----------------------------------------------------------

This mod was created by Deandra at the UESP (username Merilia at TESNexus since the name Deandra was taken). No permission is required for you to use the items I created in your own modding work, but please give credit as appropriate.
author: Merilia
